column1: A mermaid but with the fish half on top and the lady half on bottom.
A one night stand with Poseiden.
Being on boats for long periods of time, with men. Just men.
Captain Crunch being relieved of command after sinking a cruise ship while on patrol
Fitting through any sized hole like an octopus.
Riding dolphins, doing flips and shit.
The additional agony of T-Pain reminding you that you are "on a boat", while experiencing see sickness.
The redhead from Pirates of the Caribbean in Disneyland
Using Aquaman to translate English to whatever sound dolphins make.
